trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Vertegenwoordigt een verzameling <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Deze klasse kan niet worden overgenomen.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> store is opened, the result is represented by an X509Certificate2Collection object.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>store wordt geopend, het resultaat wordt vertegenwoordigd door een object X509Certificate2Collection.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an X509Certificate2Collection as a memory store of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Als u bekend met de niet-beheerde cryptografische API-constructs bent, u van een X509Certificate2Collection kunt beschouwen als een hoeveelheid geheugen <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objecten.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class without any <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse zonder <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> informatie.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object.
trans-unit.target: Deze constructor maakt een lege <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>object, in tegenstelling tot de constructors die certificaat of een verzameling gegevens gebruiken om het object te maken.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse met behulp van een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to start the collection from.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> -object op voor de verzameling van start.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse met behulp van een matrix van <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Een matrix van <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse met behulp van de verzameling van het opgegeven certificaat.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Een object toegevoegd aan het einde van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method adds an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Met deze methode wordt een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>object aan een verzameling en retourneert de indexlocatie van het certificaat.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: An X.509 certificate represented as an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een X.509-certificaat wordt weergegeven als een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the certificate has been added.
trans-unit.target: De index waarop de certificate is toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Meerdere voegt <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten in een matrix, zodat de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to add to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik deze methode als er een matrix van <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objecten toevoegen aan een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>object.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The AddRange and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: De AddRange en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>methoden aanvragen verwerken transactioneel, zodat als een enkel toevoegen of verwijderen is mislukt, wordt de hele bewerking is afgebroken.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Een matrix van <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object to another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Meerdere voegt <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten in een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object naar een andere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to add to another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik deze methode als er certificaten in een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>-object dat u wilt toevoegen aan een andere <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>object.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>methoden aanvragen verwerken transactioneel, zodat als een enkel toevoegen of verwijderen is mislukt, wordt de hele bewerking is afgebroken.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object contains a specific certificate.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt bepaald of de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object bevat een specifiek certificaat.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode voert een lineaire zoeken; de gemiddelde uitvoeringstijd is daarom die evenredig is met de <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>eigenschap.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode is een O (`n`)-bewerking, waarbij `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode bepaalt gelijkheid door het aanroepen van de <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>methode.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> object te vinden in de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: if the contains the specified certificate; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Als de bevat het opgegeven certificate ; anders .

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Gegevens van de X.509-certificaat in een bytematrix exporteert.

trans-unit.source: This method supports content types that do not require a password.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode biedt ondersteuning voor inhoudstypen waarvoor geen wachtwoord nodig.

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een ondersteunde <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certificaat voor informatie over een byte-matrix.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
trans-unit.target: Exporteert x.509-certificaatinformatie naar een byte-matrix met een wachtwoord.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Deze methode ondersteunt de volgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typen:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een ondersteunde <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A string used to protect the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Een tekenreeks die wordt gebruikt voor het beveiligen van de bytematrix.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certificaat voor informatie over een byte-matrix.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Het certificaat is onleesbaar, de inhoud is ongeldig of, in het geval van een certificaat voor een wachtwoord vereisen, de persoonlijke sleutel kan niet worden geëxporteerd omdat het opgegeven wachtwoord onjuist is.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object using the search criteria specified by the enumeration and the findValue object.
trans-unit.target: Zoekopdrachten een object met de zoekcriteria die is opgegeven door de opsomming en de findValue object.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to find <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects if no user interaction is needed.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik deze methode om te zoeken <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objecten als er geen gebruikersinteractie is vereist.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Use the Find method to allow the user to select <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: De methode zoeken gebruiken zodat de gebruiker selecteren <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objecten.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method.
trans-unit.target: Houd er rekening mee dat deze methode kan worden gebruikt in een style trapsgewijze of geneste, de zoekcriteria met elke aanroep van de methode beperking.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Een van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> waarden.

trans-unit.source: The search criteria as an object.
trans-unit.target: De zoekcriteria als een object.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow only valid certificates to be returned from the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om toe te staan, alleen geldige certificaten moeten worden geretourneerd van de zoekopdracht. anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: findType is invalid.
trans-unit.target: findTypeis ongeldig.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert een enumerator die kunt doorlopen een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Opsommingen Sta alleen-lezen toegang tot gegevens in de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumerators kunnen niet worden gebruikt om de onderliggende verzameling niet wijzigen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"></xref> object that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"> </xref> -object dat u kunt doorlopen de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een certificaat in de vorm van een bytematrix in de invoer een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode importeert u een certificaat in de vorm van een bytematrix in een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>object.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Deze methode ondersteunt de volgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typen:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Een byte-matrix met gegevens uit een X.509-certificaat.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een certificaatbestand in de invoer een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Deze methode ondersteunt de volgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typen:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: De naam van het bestand met gegevens van het certificaat.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Geïmporteerd certificaat, in de vorm van een bytematrix waarvoor een wachtwoord voor toegang tot het certificaat in een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode kan worden gebruikt met een pfx-/ PKCS12 binaire BLOB (large object) met een wachtwoord beveiligd.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Sleutelcontainers die zijn gekoppeld aan de certificaten in de BLOB PFX/PKCS12 kunnen worden gemaakt en de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>waarde kan worden gebruikt voor het beheren van dit proces.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Houd er rekening mee dat als u geen netwerkverkeersregel een sleutelcontainer maakt, de persoonlijke sleutel is niet persistent.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode wordt een bytematrix certificaat importeert in een verzameling van certificaten.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Deze methode ondersteunt de volgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typen:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een byte-matrix met gegevens uit een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Het wachtwoord is vereist voor toegang tot gegevens van het certificaat.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Een bitsgewijze combinatie van de opsommingswaarden die regelen hoe en waar het certificaat wordt geïmporteerd.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een certificaatbestand waarvoor een wachtwoord in de invoer een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode kan worden gebruikt met een pfx-/ PKCS12-bestand of andere certificaatbestanden waarvoor een wachtwoord.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Sleutelcontainers die zijn gekoppeld aan de certificaten in het pfx-/ PKCS12-bestand kunnen worden gemaakt en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>waarde kan worden gebruikt voor het beheren van dit proces.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Houd er rekening mee dat als u geen netwerkverkeersregel een sleutelcontainer maakt, de persoonlijke sleutel is niet persistent.

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: Houd er rekening mee dat een pfx-/ PKCS12-bestand meer dan één certificaat kan bevatten.

trans-unit.source: This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode importeert u het eerste certificaat dat is gekoppeld aan de persoonlijke sleutel of als er geen persoonlijke sleutel wordt gevonden, wordt het eerste certificaat gevonden.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Deze methode ondersteunt de volgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typen:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: De naam van het bestand met gegevens van het certificaat.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Het wachtwoord is vereist voor toegang tot gegevens van het certificaat.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Een bitsgewijze combinatie van de opsommingswaarden die regelen hoe en waar het certificaat wordt geïmporteerd.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee voegt u een object in de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property already equals the capacity of the list, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Als de <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>eigenschap komt al overeen met de capaciteit van de lijst, de capaciteit wordt verdubbeld door automatisch opnieuw toewijzen van de interne matrix voordat het nieuwe element wordt ingevoegd.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Als `index` gelijk is aan <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` wordt toegevoegd aan het einde van de verzameling.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `certificate`.
trans-unit.target: De op nul gebaseerde index waarop u wilt invoegen `certificate`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> object om in te voegen.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexis kleiner dan nul.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - of - index groter is dan de eigenschap.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: De verzameling is alleen-lezen.

trans-unit.source: -or- The collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - of - de verzameling heeft een vaste grootte.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van het element bij de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap biedt de mogelijkheid toegang tot een specifiek element in de verzameling met de volgende syntaxis: `myCollection[index]`.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: De op nul gebaseerde index van het element ophalen of instellen.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Het element bij de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexis kleiner dan nul.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - of - index is gelijk aan of groter zijn dan de eigenschap.

trans-unit.source: index is .
trans-unit.target: indexis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee verwijdert u het eerste exemplaar van een certificaat van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode verwijdert u het eerste exemplaar van een certificaat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to be removed from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> object worden verwijderd uit de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee verwijdert u meerdere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten in een matrix van een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to remove from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik deze methode als er een matrix van <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objecten verwijderen uit een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>object.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and RemoveRange methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>en RemoveRange methoden aanvragen verwerken transactioneel, zodat als een enkel toevoegen of verwijderen is mislukt, wordt de hele bewerking is afgebroken.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Een matrix van <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee verwijdert u meerdere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objecten in een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object van een andere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to remove from another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik deze methode als er certificaten in een <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>-object dat u wilt verwijderen van een andere <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>object.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>methoden aanvragen verwerken transactioneel, zodat als een enkel toevoegen of verwijderen is mislukt, wordt de hele bewerking is afgebroken.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .
